attribution: Adapted with permission from UCLES, O Level Physics, June 1978, Paper 1, Question 1.
title: A Well

children.value:
A sphere of polystyrene and a small sphere of lead, each of mass 
$\quantity{0.2}{kg}$
 are released together from rest and fall down a deep well with water at the bottom. The lead cube is found to take 
$\quantity{4.0}{s}$
 to reach the water surface.
Calculate the speed with which the lead cube hits the water?
What is the depth of the well to the water's surface.

The polystyrene cube takes 
$\quantity{6.0}{s}$
 longer to hit the water.
